name: Claustrum (TiberiumSea)
description:
GAME FOR EPICMEGAJAM

A game about a man with claustrophobia and fear of the dark.

Can you turn on the lights everywhere before you go crazy?

Controls:

WASD- move 

E- interact

Mouse move-rotate character

Press mouse whell to rotate camera

Double click R to restart level

Double click Escape to quit game
